synopsis.text:
When ordinary life takes an extraordinary turn, Aoi finds himself in a world beyond his wildest dreams! Transformed into a frog by a mystical splash of water, he's thrust into the enchanting frog kingdom in search of the elusive Princess Mimori. But there's a twist: the princess herself is clueless about the spell to revert his amphibian transformation!

In this whimsical realm, Aoi discovers his unique condition: he's a frog when wet, and human when dry. Together with the adorable but not-so-helpful Mimori, they embark on a thrilling quest to recover the scattered fragments of a magical book, believed to hold the key to his cure.

Filled with laughter, adventure, and a touch of magic, Aoi's journey is a testament to resilience and friendship. Will they find the missing spell and restore Aoi's human form? Join them in this enchanting escapade and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
